Just play it. You won't regret buying Portal. 
The levels aren't that hard, they just make you think creatively. I didn't need any walkthrough to beat the game and that's why I love it. (I hate when I need to watch YouTube or read some wiki articles to be able to understand how to pass a level.)
And if it wasn't enough hard for you, the challenges can really take some time to beat.

[h1] Portal [/h1]

O que dizer sobre Portal? Um jogo de Puzzle com gráficos sensacionais e um enredo fantastico. 
Os Puzzles do Portal são relativamente desafiantes, mas não impossiveis.
A historia é aquele tipo de historia cativante, que você sempre quer passar logo a fase pra saber o restante.
i solve puzzle

This game is a masterpiece. You should buy it.

However, the way that the game was made was kinda... lazy.
First of all, a lot of the sound effects used are all from another game by the same developer, Half-Life 2. If you press "use" on a wall you will hear a error sound. That sound was from Half-Life.
Secondly, the HUD is also from Half-Life 2. I think that game's HUD is what Gordon Freeman sees on his H.E.V. suit, but Chell from Portal does not have a H.E.V. suit. So why is the HUD in this game taken from HL2?
I guess it's because both games take place within the same universe, but still.
Anyway, great game!

(WHY ARE THERE WEAPONS FROM HL2 STILL IN PORTAL'S FILES?)

Very, very, good.  I finished in three hours though, so might want to grab it on sale.  A simple-ish puzzle game that's a blast to control with some great themes.  GLaDOS probably rates second to Handsome Jack for my favorite video game bad guy.  I have now played a second game featuring a evil girl AI that sings a goodby song during the credits.   10/10

Все говорят что игра сложная, но большинство играли ток в осн сюжет и там только надо подумать как пройти. В игре есть бонусные карты и вот тут и начинаются сложность игры начиная с усложнённых камер, заканчивая испытаниями( на время, на шаги и на  минимум порталов). Игра для умных и прошареных.

Oyunu yavaş bir şekilde 3 saatte bitirdim. Portal 2'de bulmacalarda fazla zamanlama olmamasına rağmen bu oyunda çok fazla zamanlamalı bulmaca var. Aksiyon kısımları da Portal 2'ye göre az, ama oyun gayet başarılı. Bu arada pasta yalan değil, gayet güzeldi, vanilyalıydı. Ama yanında bi kola veya herhangi bir içecek iyi giderdi, ama vermediler. Kuru kuru yedik ama sağlık olsun, pastacının eline sağlık.

Игра, конечно, короткая, но уж больно необычная.
Удивляет Валв: что ни игра, то шедевр. Халва, порталы, контра. И как им это удается?
Временами приходится хорошенько пораскинуть мозгами. А иногда думаешь: дай вот так попробую, вроде не должно получиться, но все же.. И оно получается. Сам не понимаешь, почему.
Один вопрос только остается: может, нам все же дали бы тортик, если бы мы не... Ну, вы поняли.
